includedAssets.title: Orientacion
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael and Lincoln find their roles reversed in season three of the nail-biting drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and Lincoln find their roles reversed in season three of the nail-biting drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael and Lincoln find their roles reversed in season three of the nail-biting drama.

includedAssets.title: Fire/Water
includedAssets.synopsis: The edge of your seat drama continues. Armed with a plan, Michael races to find mysterious inmate Whistler before Mahone does.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The edge of your seat drama continues. Armed with a plan, Michael races to find mysterious inmate Whistler before Mahone does.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The edge of your seat drama continues. Armed with a plan, Michael races to find mysterious inmate Whistler before Mahone does.

includedAssets.title: Call Waiting
includedAssets.synopsis: The intense drama continues. Michael is forced to ask T-Bag for help as he attempts to gain access to the only phone in Sona: Lechero's.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The edge of your seat drama continues. Armed with a plan, Michael races to find mysterious inmate Whistler before Mahone does.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The intense drama continues. Michael is forced to ask T-Bag for help as he attempts to gain access to the only phone in Sona: Lechero's.

includedAssets.title: Good Fences
includedAssets.synopsis: The gripping drama continues as Michael begins to piece his escape plan together. Plus, Sucre takes up grave digging and Lincoln keeps a devastating secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The gripping drama continues as Michael begins to piece his escape plan together.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The gripping drama continues as Michael begins to piece his escape plan together. Plus, Sucre takes up grave digging and Lincoln keeps a devastating secret.

includedAssets.title: Interference
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael needs to escape from Sona. With Linc preparing on the outside and Michael working his genius from the inside, everything looks set...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael needs to escape from Sona. With Linc preparing on the outside and Michael working his genius from the inside, everything looks set...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael needs to escape from Sona. With Linc preparing on the outside and Michael working his genius from the inside, everything looks set...

includedAssets.title: Photo Finish
includedAssets.synopsis: Sona's 'kingpin', Lechero, gets set to punish a framed Whistler for murder. Plus, Michael's world is shattered when he learns the truth about Sara.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sona's 'kingpin', Lechero, gets set to punish a framed Whistler for murder. Plus, Michael's world is shattered when he learns the truth about Sara.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sona's 'kingpin', Lechero, gets set to punish a framed Whistler for murder. Plus, Michael's world is shattered when he learns the truth about Sara.

includedAssets.title: Vamonos
includedAssets.synopsis: Still reeling from the death of Sara, Michael is locked into a fight to the death with Whistler. Unless they can put their escape plan into action first...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Still reeling from the death of Sara, Michael is locked into a fight to the death with Whistler.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Still reeling from the death of Sara, Michael is locked into a fight to the death with Whistler. Unless they can put their escape plan into action first...

includedAssets.title: Bang And Burn
includedAssets.synopsis: The Company want Whistler out of Sona, and they want him out now. The escape plan explodes into action, but it's not Whistler leaving the prison walls...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Company want Whistler out of Sona, and they want him out now. The escape plan explodes into action, but it's not Whistler who's leaving.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Company want Whistler out of Sona, and they want him out now. The escape plan explodes into action, but it's not Whistler leaving the prison walls...

includedAssets.title: Boxed In
includedAssets.synopsis: Having been pulled out of Sona, Michael finds himself in solitary confinement, while the inmates left behind struggle without him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Having been pulled out of Sona, Michael finds himself in solitary confinement, while the inmates left behind struggle without him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Having been pulled out of Sona, Michael finds himself in solitary confinement, while the inmates left behind struggle without him.

includedAssets.title: Dirt Nap
includedAssets.synopsis: As the attempted breakout continues, Michael makes a decision which will haunt him forever, while Linc buys a bomb on the black market.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the attempted breakout continues, Michael makes a decision which will haunt him forever, while Linc buys a bomb on the black market.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the attempted breakout continues, Michael makes a decision which will haunt him forever, while Linc buys a bomb on the black market.

includedAssets.title: Under And Out
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael desperately tries to figure out how to dig a tunnel in 24 hours. But with his fellow plotters turning against him, he might not need to bother.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael desperately tries to figure out how to dig a tunnel in 24 hours.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael desperately tries to figure out how to dig a tunnel in 24 hours. But with his fellow plotters turning against him, he might not need to bother.

includedAssets.title: Hell Or High Water
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep12 - Hell Or High Water
includedAssets.synopsis: It's time to go. Michael's plan to break out of Sona comes to a head in a tension-packed episode of the hit series. Will they make it?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's time to go. Michael's plan to break out of Sona comes to a head in a tension-packed episode of the hit series. Will they make it?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's time to go. Michael's plan to break out of Sona comes to a head in a tension-packed episode of the hit series. Will they make it?

includedAssets.title: The Art of the Deal
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep13 - The Art of the Deal
includedAssets.synopsis: It's crunch time for Michael and Linc as they prepare to hand Whistler over to Susan. Meanwhile, T-Bag's scheming at Sona finally pays off.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's crunch time for Michael and Linc as they prepare to hand Whistler over to Susan. Meanwhile, T-Bag's scheming at Sona finally pays off.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's crunch time for Michael and Linc as they prepare to hand Whistler over to Susan. Meanwhile, T-Bag's scheming at Sona finally pays off.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael finds himself in a familiar situation, which The Company seek to use to their advantage. Thrilling third season of the smash-hit U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael is in a familiar situation, which The Company seek to use to their advantage. Third season of the hit U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael finds himself in a familiar situation, which The Company seek to use to their advantage. Thrilling third season of the smash-hit U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner.

includedIn.title: Prison Break
includedIn.synopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.
